dct_title_s: Hudson River New York Harbor, Bedloes Island to Fort Lee, Sheet No. 2, 48th Street to Fort Lee
dct_description_sm: Chart showing pierhead and bulkhead lines, compilation of nautical surveys and assessments throughout the Hudson River New York Harbor, in particular the area between Bedloes Island and Ft. Lee, New Jersey.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Surveyed in compliance with River and Harbor Act of June 25, 1910
Data regarding currents in North and East Rivers excepting, as noted below, in the neighborhood of Corlears Hook and Hell gate are taken from the U.S.C. & G.S. Tide Tables for 1912.
